name: The Karalapakkam Society for Rural and Sustainable Development

address: Air Force Nagar, TSP Road, Veerapuram

briefDescription: KSRSD registered in the year 2000 is the parent body of Institute of Sustainable Development (ISD) that formed in the year 2005. Founded by a group of social scientists and social workers, ISD now has a multidisciplinary team and engage in Research, Training and Community Participatory Initiatives in Sustainable Development. ISDâ€™s expertise in Social Development Research and Training are sought by other agencies including Government, National, and International organisations.  The Community Participatory Initiatives in Thiruvallur district, organised with a strong focus on stakeholder participation for sustainable development, provide great opportunities for an experiential learning for aspiring professionals in Integrated Water Resource Management, Participatory Development, and Stakeholder participation.
